languages.text: {n}Ветхий старец с седой бородой, окрашенной кровью, складывает морщинистые руки в ритуальном жесте. Тело его покрыто свежими и застарелыми шрамами, глаза плотно зашиты, а рот, рассеченный с двух сторон, придает челюсти схожесть со змеиной.{/n} "И прош{mf|ел|ла} цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега тропами нежизни, следами первой из тех, кто соткал паутину кровавую. И склонились слуги смерти пред {mf|ним|ней}, ибо Домин есть податель{mf||ница} жизни".

{n}A frail old man, grey beard tinged with blood, folds his wrinkled hands in a ritual gesture. His body is covered in scars, some old, some fresh. His eyes are sewn tightly shut. His mouth is cleft at both corners, making his jaw seem eerily snakelike.{/n} "And the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark walked the paths of unlife, in the footsteps of the Web's very first spinner. And the servants of death bowed before {mf|him|her}, for the Domin is the giver of life."
languages.original_text: {n}Ветхий старец с седой бородой, окрашенной кровью, складывает морщинистые руки в ритуальном жесте. Тело его покрыто свежими и застарелыми шрамами, глаза плотно зашиты, а рот, рассеченный с двух сторон, придает челюсти схожесть со змеиной.{/n} "И прош{mf|ел|ла} цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега тропами нежизни, следами первой из тех, кто соткал паутину кровавую. И склонились слуги смерти пред {mf|ним|ней}, ибо Домин есть податель{mf||ница} жизни".

traits.locale_text: {n}A frail old man whose grey beard is tinted with blood folds his wrinkled hands in a ritual gesture. His body is covered in scars, some old, some fresh. His eyes are sewn tightly shut. His mouth is cleft at both corners, making his jaw similar to a snake's.{/n} "And the {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark walked the paths of unlife, in the footsteps of the Bloodspun Web's very first weaver. And the servants of death bowed before {mf|him|her}, for Enim is the giver of life."

languages.text: {n}Ein gebrechlicher alter Mann, der graue Bart voller Blut, verschränkt seine welken Hände zu einer rituellen Geste. Sein Körper ist mit alten und frischen Narben übersät. Seine Augen sind fest zugenäht. Seine Mundwinkel sind eingerissen, was seinem Kiefer ein etwas unheimliches, schlangenhaftes Aussehen verleiht.{/n} "Und {mf|der Lord|die Lady} der Arche beschritt die Pfade des Unlebens, in den Fußstapfen der ersten Spinnerin des Netzes. Und die Diener des Todes verneigten sich vor {mf|ihm, denn der Domin ist der Lebensspender|ihr, denn die Domin ist die Lebensspenderin}."
languages.original_text: {n}A frail old man, grey beard tinged with blood, folds his wrinkled hands in a ritual gesture. His body is covered in scars, some old, some fresh. His eyes are sewn tightly shut. His mouth is cleft at both corners, making his jaw seem eerily snakelike.{/n} "And the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark walked the paths of unlife, in the footsteps of the Web's very first spinner. And the servants of death bowed before {mf|him|her}, for the Domin is the giver of life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein gebrechlicher alter Mann, der graue Bart voller Blut, verschränkt seine welken Hände zu einer rituellen Geste. Sein Körper ist mit alten und frischen Narben übersät. Seine Augen sind fest zugenäht. Seine Mundwinkel sind eingerissen, was seinem Kiefer ein etwas unheimliches, schlangenhaftes Aussehen verleiht.{/n} "Und {mf|der Lord|die Lady} der Arche beschritt die Pfade des Unlebens, in den Fußstapfen der ersten Spinnerin des Netzes. Und die Diener des Todes verneigten sich vor {mf|ihm, denn der Domin ist der Lebensspender|ihr, denn die Domin ist die Lebensspenderin}."

languages.text: {n}Un anciano frágil de barba gris manchada de sangre entrelaza sus manos arrugadas en un gesto ritual. Su cuerpo está cubierto de cicatrices, unas nuevas y otras recientes. Tiene los ojos cosidos. Los extremos de sus labios presentan hendiduras, lo que da a su mandíbula un aspecto inquietante que recuerda a una serpiente.{/n} «Y {mf|el señor|la señora} del Arca recorrió las sendas de la no vida, tras los pasos de la primera tejedora de la Red. Y los sirvientes de la muerte se inclinaron ante {mf|él|ella}, pues {mf|el|la} Domin es {mf|el|la} dador{mf||a} de vida».
languages.original_text: {n}A frail old man, grey beard tinged with blood, folds his wrinkled hands in a ritual gesture. His body is covered in scars, some old, some fresh. His eyes are sewn tightly shut. His mouth is cleft at both corners, making his jaw seem eerily snakelike.{/n} "And the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark walked the paths of unlife, in the footsteps of the Web's very first spinner. And the servants of death bowed before {mf|him|her}, for the Domin is the giver of life."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un anciano frágil de barba gris manchada de sangre entrelaza sus manos arrugadas en un gesto ritual. Su cuerpo está cubierto de cicatrices, unas nuevas y otras recientes. Tiene los ojos cosidos. Los extremos de sus labios presentan hendiduras, lo que da a su mandíbula un aspecto inquietante que recuerda a una serpiente.{/n} «Y {mf|el señor|la señora} del Arca recorrió las sendas de la no vida, tras los pasos de la primera tejedora de la Red. Y los sirvientes de la muerte se inclinaron ante {mf|él|ella}, pues {mf|el|la} Domin es {mf|el|la} dador{mf||a} de vida».

languages.text: {n}血で汚れた灰色のあごひげを蓄えたひ弱な老人が、しわだらけの手を組んで、儀式のようなしぐさをしている。体は傷だらけで、古いものもあれば新しいものもある。目はきつく縫い閉じられている。口は両端が裂けており、顎は不気味な蛇のように見える。{/n}「箱舟の主人はウェブの紡績工の足跡をたどり、不死への道を歩いた。そして死の従者たちは{mf|彼|彼女}の前にひれ伏した。なぜならドミンは生命を与える者なのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}A frail old man, grey beard tinged with blood, folds his wrinkled hands in a ritual gesture. His body is covered in scars, some old, some fresh. His eyes are sewn tightly shut. His mouth is cleft at both corners, making his jaw seem eerily snakelike.{/n} "And the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark walked the paths of unlife, in the footsteps of the Web's very first spinner. And the servants of death bowed before {mf|him|her}, for the Domin is the giver of life."

traits.locale_text: {n}血で汚れた灰色のあごひげを蓄えたひ弱な老人が、しわだらけの手を組んで、儀式のようなしぐさをしている。体は傷だらけで、古いものもあれば新しいものもある。目はきつく縫い閉じられている。口は両端が裂けており、顎は不気味な蛇のように見える。{/n}「箱舟の主人はブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手の足跡をたどり、不死への道を歩いた。そして死の従者たちは{mf|彼|彼女}の前にひれ伏した。なぜならエニムは生命を与える者なのだから」

languages.text: {n}你眼前站着一位身体瘦削的老人，灰白的胡须上带着血迹，满是皱纹的双手以特别的方式交叉在一起，仿佛在举行某种仪式。他浑身上下都是伤疤，既有旧伤，也有新伤。他的双眼被线紧紧缝住，嘴巴两边带着裂缝，看起来莫名地像一条蛇。{/n}“由是，方舟之主沿着罗网首位织网者的足迹，踏上了死亡的道路。死亡的仆人都向{mf|他|她}朝拜，因为{mf|他|她}是赐予生命的秘者。”
languages.original_text: {n}A frail old man, grey beard tinged with blood, folds his wrinkled hands in a ritual gesture. His body is covered in scars, some old, some fresh. His eyes are sewn tightly shut. His mouth is cleft at both corners, making his jaw seem eerily snakelike.{/n} "And the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark walked the paths of unlife, in the footsteps of the Web's very first spinner. And the servants of death bowed before {mf|him|her}, for the Domin is the giver of life."

traits.locale_text: {n}你眼前站着一位身体瘦削的老人，灰白的胡须上带着血迹，满是皱纹的双手以特别的方式交叉在一起，仿佛在举行某种仪式。他浑身上下都是伤疤，既有旧伤，也有新伤。他的双眼被线紧紧缝住，嘴巴两边带着裂缝，看起来莫名地像一条蛇。{/n}“由是，方舟之主沿着罗网首位织网者的足迹，踏上了死亡的道路。死亡的仆人都向{mf|他|她}朝拜，因为{mf|他|她}是赐予生命的秘者。”

languages.text: {n}Un vieil homme frêle à la barbe grise teintée de sang croise ses mains ridées en un geste rituel. Son corps est couvert de cicatrices, certaines encore fraîches, d'autres plus anciennes, et ses paupières sont cousues. Les commissures crevassées de ses lèvres donnent à sa mâchoire des allures dangereusement ophidiennes.{/n} « Et {mf|le seigneur|la maîtresse} de l'Arche emprunta les sentiers de la non-vie, sur les traces de la toute première tisseuse de la Toile. Et les serviteurs de la mort s'inclinèrent devant {mf|lui|elle}, car {mf|le|la} Domin est Source de vie. »
languages.original_text: {n}A frail old man, grey beard tinged with blood, folds his wrinkled hands in a ritual gesture. His body is covered in scars, some old, some fresh. His eyes are sewn tightly shut. His mouth is cleft at both corners, making his jaw seem eerily snakelike.{/n} "And the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark walked the paths of unlife, in the footsteps of the Web's very first spinner. And the servants of death bowed before {mf|him|her}, for the Domin is the giver of life."

languages.text: {n}Gri sakalı kana bulanmış, çelimsiz bir ihtiyar; buruşuk ellerini bükerek bir ayin işareti yapıyor. Bedeni, bazısı eski bazısı yeni pek çok yara iziyle kaplı. Gözleri dikilip sıkıca kapatılmış. Çenesi, ağzının her iki yanındaki kesiklerle tüyler ürpertici bir şekilde yılanı andırıyor.{/n} "Ark'ın {mf|Lordu|Leydisi}, Ağ'ın ilk dokurunun ayak izlerini takip ederek yaşamsızlık yolundan yürüdü. Ölümün hizmetkârları ise can bahşeden Domin'in önünde eğildi."
languages.original_text: {n}A frail old man, grey beard tinged with blood, folds his wrinkled hands in a ritual gesture. His body is covered in scars, some old, some fresh. His eyes are sewn tightly shut. His mouth is cleft at both corners, making his jaw seem eerily snakelike.{/n} "And the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark walked the paths of unlife, in the footsteps of the Web's very first spinner. And the servants of death bowed before {mf|him|her}, for the Domin is the giver of life."
